CustomField.formula: CASE(Preferred_Language__pc , "English", IMAGE("/resource/1668529526000/Flag_GB?", "Preferred Language = English") & "English", "Dutch", IMAGE("/resource/1668529478000/Flag_NL?", "Preferred Language = Dutch")& "Dutch", "French", IMAGE("/resource/1668529603000/Flag_FR?", "Preferred Language = French")& "French", "German", IMAGE("/resource/1668529563000/Flag_DE?", "Preferred Language = German") & "German", "")
CustomField.label: Preferred Language
